title: Input
description: This request can be used when we have a byte array which we wish to do Bech32m encoding on. In this case, the HRP to use will be determined through the entity byte of the passed address hex string.

address_bytes.description: A byte array of 27 bytes (54 hex characters) serialized as a hex string of the data part of the address.

network_id.description: An 8 bit unsigned integer serialized as a string which represents the id of the network that this address exists on.
